'''Scott Major''', better known as '''{{PAGENAME}}''' or '''Dangthatsalongname''', is a Scottish YouTuber and [[Twitch]] streamer, known for co-founding [[MC Championship]].

== In the ''Minecraft'' franchise ==
In 2019, he was invited to attend the [[Minecraft Creator Summit]].<ref>{{Tweet|Smajor1995|1132027772090703883|I’ve had the absolute BEST time at this years Minecraft Creator Summit! I’m so greatful to have had the chance to go again and meet my friends and so many amazing people! I also got to test out Minecraft Earth which is AMAZING! Yall in for a treat! Thanks again @Minecraft  @Mojang}}</ref> Later in the year was one of the co-hosts for [[MINECON Live 2019]], alongside MasuoTV, Marielitai Gaming, and Shubble.<ref>{{Mcnet|minecon-live-co-hosts-revealed|MINECON Live co-hosts revealed|July 26, 2019|[[Tom Stone]]}}</ref><ref>{{Mcnet|meet-four-minecrafters--minecon-hosts-|Meet four Minecrafters: MINECON Hosts!|September 19, 2019|Kelsey Howard}}</ref> Following this, he and [[Noxcrew]] would create [[MC Championship]] event, which would eventually host the [[Ender Cup]], [[Colour the World]], and [[The Copper Crown]]. He appears in almost every MCC event as a co-organizer.

In 2022, Smajor participated in a promotional stream for a collaboration between [[Lacoste]] and {{MC}}.<ref>{{Mcnet|lacoste-x-minecraft|Lacoste x Minecraft|March 15, 2022|Staff}}</ref><ref>{{YouTube link|IMqQ97pBuN8|Lacoste x Minecraft: Community Creator Showdown!|Minecraft|March 14, 2022}}</ref>

In 2025, Smajor appeared as a guest at the {{AMCM|green carpet}} premiere of {{AMCM}}.

=== Events ===
In 2024, he participated in the [[Ender Cup]], a special edition of [[MC Championship]] made for the 15th anniversary of Minecraft. To promote the event, Smajor voiced a fictionalized version of himself in the [[event server]] [[MCC x Minecraft 15th Anniversary Party]].
